recipesJson.name: Strawberry Lemonade (Pod nic salt)
recipesJson.author: NastyNate
recipesJson.description: Another Pod recipe I threw together really quick. Your standard strawberry lemonade!

reviews.text: I must say that this recipe is my favorite POD recipe I've mixed so far. I can actually taste the flavors in it, especially the lemonade. I did, however raise the flavor percentage to 30% and found no off notes or other weird stuff. Maybe 20% flavoring would taste the same as my 30%, no idea. Thanks for sharing.
